price: (3) O descendants of those We carried [in the ship] with Noah. Indeed, he was a grateful servant.
arabic: ذُرِّيَّةَ مَنۡ حَمَلۡنَا مَعَ نُوحٍۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ عَبۡدٗا شَكُورٗا

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: dhurriyyata man ḥamalnā maʿa nūḥin innahu kāna ʿabdan shakūran
